page.title: 15Binsdale Farm,Boynton.
page.content: Binsdale Farm has 238 acres.It has 130 acres of wheat,23 acres of winter barley,30 acres of spring barley and 31 acres of oil seed rape.The Farm house is made out of chalk and it has a slate roof.The other old buildings are made out of chalk and have pantile roofs.It has a corn shed,a straw shed and a cattle shed.The implements the farm has are some rollers, a potato planter, a drag, a rotavator, a plough,3 International tractors, a pick-up, a potato rower, a Claas combine, a baler, a cattle crush, a drill, a front loader, a potato lifter and a disc harrow. There is two acres of sloping land that has been planted with trees. The kinds of trees are ash, cherry, hawthorn, holly, white beam and Scots pine.
